analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/5/0xe084e26a39ee84b3499c6f8c64bbcd52ea90ab2c.sol#82) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/5/0xe084e26a39ee84b3499c6f8c64bbcd52ea90ab2c.sol#108-115)

SOVREN.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/5/0xe084e26a39ee84b3499c6f8c64bbcd52ea90ab2c.sol#201-202) shadows:
	- SOVRENToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/5/0xe084e26a39ee84b3499c6f8c64bbcd52ea90ab2c.sol#11-13)

Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xe084e26a39ee84b3499c6f8c64bbcd52ea90ab2c.sol#82)
SOVREN.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xe084e26a39ee84b3499c6f8c64bbcd52ea90ab2c.sol#201-202)
SOVRENToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xe084e26a39ee84b3499c6f8c64bbcd52ea90ab2c.sol#11-13)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/5/0xe084e26a39ee84b3499c6f8c64bbcd52ea90ab2c.sol:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
